@graph.name: Vegan Creamy Cajun Pasta with Breaded tofu.
@graph.description: Vegan Creamy Cajun Pasta with Crisp Breaded tofu. Nut-free Creamy Cajun Spice Sauce with Farfalle and Breaded Tofu. Vegan Nut-free Recipe. Soy-free option. Easily oil-free

video.name: CAJUN PASTA WITH BREADED TOFU | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Vegan Creamy Cajun Pasta with Crisp Breaded tofu. Nut-free Creamy Cajun Spice Sauce with Farfalle. 23 Gm of Protein.
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2019/10/vegan-creamy-cajun-pasta-with-breaded-tofu.html

This Creamy Pasta Sauce has my cajun blend for a smoky delicious flavor profile. The sauce is creamy, fluffy and is made with tofu. I have started to make more Tofu sauces(Lemon Asparagus Pasta) as they are so much quicker than cashew sauces. They also amp up the protein in the meal!

The peppers and onions add flavor. I top the pasta with a smoky breaded tofu. You can use other toppings such as roasted cauliflower or veggies, or chickpeas or vegan meat subs. Or just serve as is! See Recipe notes for tofu-free option.

Music: Ikson Calling
#easyveganrecipes #veganricha #cajunpasta #breadedtofu #veganpasta


MY BOOKS:
INDIAN KITCHEN:  https://veganricha.com/vegan-richas-indian-kitchen-cookbook
EVERYDAY KITCHEN: https://veganricha.com/vegan-richas-everyday-kitchen
Both have about 150 Recipes each. With many gluten-free, nut-free, soy-free recipes and options listed with recipes. Available everywhere Internationally as well.
Follow: 
My blog: https://veganricha.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/VeganRicha
Instagram: https://instagram.com/veganricha
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/veganricha
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/veganricha

recipeIngredient: 1 cup non dairy milk such as soy milk, oat milk or almond milk
1 tsp miso (, mellow miso or chickpea miso)
9 oz firm or extra firm tofu (, drained and pressed for 10 mins, then sliced into 1/2 inch thick slices)
1/2 tsp poultry seasoning (or use a mix of sage, thyme and oregano)
1 tsp smoked paprika (or a mix of sweet and smoked, or use cajun seasoning)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to instructions on package and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to instructions on package and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Breaded tofu: Mix the soy sauce, herbs, spices, cornstarch, lime in a shallow bowl. Coat each slice of the Tofu and let is sit to marinate for 10-15 mins. Meanwhile prep the sauce(below).
recipeInstructions.name: Breaded tofu: Mix the soy sauce, herbs, spices, cornstarch, lime in a shallow bowl. Coat each slice of the Tofu and let is sit to marinate for 10-15 mins. Meanwhile prep the sauce(below).

recipeInstructions.text: In another shallow bowl mix breadcrumbs, onion flakes. Coat each tofu slice in the breadcrumb mixture, Then pan fry in a regular skillet or grill skillet over medium-high heat for 4 to 5 mins each side, or bake for at 400 deg F (205 C) for 25 mins. Slice into half inch slices.
recipeInstructions.name: In another shallow bowl mix breadcrumbs, onion flakes. Coat each tofu slice in the breadcrumb mixture, Then pan fry in a regular skillet or grill skillet over medium-high heat for 4 to 5 mins each side, or bake for at 400 deg F (205 C) for 25 mins. Slice into half inch slices.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Cajun Cream Sauce: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for a few seconds, add onion and mix and cook for half a minute. Add bell pepper and mushrooms and a good pinch of salt and cook until golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Cajun Cream Sauce: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for a few seconds, add onion and mix and cook for half a minute. Add bell pepper and mushrooms and a good pinch of salt and cook until golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, blend the rest of the ingredients (tofu through salt) in a blender until smooth. Add this to the skillet and mix well. Bring to a boil. Taste and adjust flavor with more salt, cajun spice, nutritional yeast if needed. (some tofu brands are denser and might need more of the flavor ingredients).
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, blend the rest of the ingredients (tofu through salt) in a blender until smooth. Add this to the skillet and mix well. Bring to a boil. Taste and adjust flavor with more salt, cajun spice, nutritional yeast if needed. (some tofu brands are denser and might need more of the flavor ingredients).

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in the cooked farfalle and toss to coat. Switch off heat. Cover and let sit for 2 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Fold in the cooked farfalle and toss to coat. Switch off heat. Cover and let sit for 2 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: The pasta is great as is as well. Garnish with 1/4 cup or more chopped tomato, pepper flakes and cilantro. Serve with sliced breaded tofu, Store: Pasta sauce and cajun pasta can be stored refrigerated for upto 3 days.Tofu breading will soften on storage, Re-bake and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: The pasta is great as is as well. Garnish with 1/4 cup or more chopped tomato, pepper flakes and cilantro. Serve with sliced breaded tofu, Store: Pasta sauce and cajun pasta can be stored refrigerated for upto 3 days.Tofu breading will soften on storage, Re-bake and serve.
